quest.name: Shedding Light on the Myth
journal: As is her wont, Qeshi-Rae wants to discuss the samiel with you.
objectives: Gather a shred of ancient animal skin at Timh GyeusDeliver the shred of ancient animal skin to Qeshi-Rae.
Speak with Qeshi-Rae at the Crystalline Mean.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Acht-la Ormh Inn.”

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Yes, this is truly a mystery... We know that the samiel is out there─it's left plenty of evidence of its passage. So why can't we find it?

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: <huff> <wheeze> Ch-Chief! We have a problem!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Yalana, you should know better than to run at full tilt! You're an academic─you're liable to kill yourself!

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: N-Never mind me! It's Mao─he's gone off to Il Mheg to search for the samiel...alone!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: He's what!?

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: The other researchers, they blamed him for putting the idea of the samiel into your head. “It's because of you she's chasing some fool myth,” they jeered.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: Mao couldn't bear their barbs, and in his anger, he rushed off with little more than the clothes on his back!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: There's no time to waste! We must find him before he runs afoul of the faeries!

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: B-But, Chief! What if we run afoul of the faeries?

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: We'll have Forename with us. SheHe has friends among the pixies. Isn't that right?

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: I see... Yes, we'd be much assured if you could ask the pixies of Lydha Lran after Mao's whereabouts.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: While you see to that, Yalana and I will cast around by the entrance. Come and find us after you've made your inquiries. Now then, let us hurry!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03237A
dialogue.text: The man with the big ears? Ooh, yes, I know the one! Was chasing him, as a matter of fact!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03237A
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, I lost sight of him west of the lake. If I see him again, I'll turn him into a cute leafman! Tee hee!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03237B
dialogue.text: What!? A mortal's come here to play!? Nobody told me that! That's not fair! I'm so bored! Bored, bored, bored! I want to play with him too!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03237C
dialogue.text: Hmmm? That mortal's your friend, you say? Had I known that, I would've greeted him with a shove into the lake! Tee hee hee!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It appears Mao-Ladd is somewhere near Longmirror Lake. Time to take word to the others, who await you at Timh Gyeus.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: I've only dared set foot in Il Mheg a few times. The place is at once beautiful and terrifying.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: Oh, where are you, Mao?

dialogue.name: PIXIE03237A
dialogue.text: I lost sight of the man with the big ears west of the lake.

dialogue.name: PIXIE03237A
dialogue.text: If I see him again, I'll turn him into a cute leafman! Tee hee!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03237B
dialogue.text: Nobody told me about the mortal! That's not fair! I'm so bored! Bored, bored, bored! I want to play with him too!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03237C
dialogue.text: Had I known that mortal was your friend, I would've greeted him with a shove into the lake! Tee hee hee!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: There you are. Were you able to learn anything about Mao's whereabouts?

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Truly? Thank you, Forename! We could never have located him without your help!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Come, let's make haste to Longmirror Lake. Quickly and quietly does it...

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: What were you thinking, lad? You could've been killed, or worse!

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: He's safe, thank goodness. It's a miracle he managed to come this far unharmed.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: Forename! I'm so sorry for all the trouble!

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: And so you should be! The chief alone is enough of a handful─I can't chase you down as well!

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: B-But the others, they spoke ill of the chief. I couldn't just stand by and take it.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: I know it was reckless of me to come out here alone...but thanks to that, I was able to find an actual part of the samiel!

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: There's...er, just one problem─in my haste, I forgot my tools. Forename, you seem to have yours. Could you do the collecting in my stead?

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: Lest you wonder, it's a shred of scaly skin. I spotted it in this area, Timh Gyeus, after noticing rub marks on the trees and rocks.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: I spotted the skin in this area, Timh Gyeus, after noticing rub marks on the trees and rocks. Please collect it in my stead.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: While droppings can tell us much about a creature, there's no substitute for an actual piece of it. In spite of myself, I'm quite excited, I must admit!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: So, did you find the shred of skin?

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Mmm-hmmm! While it's a little on the shriveled side, this is indeed skin from the creature. It was likely molting.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: A molting creature! That's one more thing we know about it! I can't wait to see what else this specimen can tell us!

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: The s-s-samiel! It's b-b-behind you!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Hm? I don't see anything.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: Me neither.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: Th-That's odd... It was there just a moment ago. And its shape─I'd swear it matches that of the shadow I saw in Amh Araeng.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: I don't know how, but it literally disappeared in the blink of an eye.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: Forename, you saw it too, didn't you? It wasn't just my imagination?

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Truly!? It was right there, and I missed it!? Gah, of all the rotten luck!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Tell me, what did it look like? What was its color? Smell? Size?

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: Chief, perhaps we should save the questions for after we leave this place. Even with Forename, it may not be entirely safe for us here.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Yes, you have the right of it. It wouldn't do to have the faeries get their hands on our precious specimen. Come, let's return to the Crystarium.

dialogue.name: YALANA
dialogue.text: Thank you for helping us to find Mao-Ladd. I shudder to think what may have happened to him.

dialogue.name: MAOLADD
dialogue.text: Anger carried my steps to Il Mheg, but it quickly gave way to terror. I'm in your debt.

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Well, that was certainly a harrowing outing, but it wasn't without fruit─in the form of a piece of the samiel itself! Ahhh, to feel the scaly texture in my hands and breathe in its mysterious smell... Pure bliss, I tell you!

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Alas, Yalana snatched it from me before I could have a little taste...

dialogue.name: QESHIRAE
dialogue.text: Well, for now we'll just have to leave her to her task. I'm sure she'll have new information for us before long, so do not wander far!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next request will be available from Qeshi-Rae upon reaching level 78 as a miner or botanist.

obj.n: On the Trail of a Myth
